sourcesContent:
import React, {useContext, useEffect, useState} from 'react' import {GlobalState} from '../../../GlobalState' import Loading from '../utils/Loading/Loading' import Image from '../../headers/icon/profile.svg' import './profile.css' import axios from 'axios' function Profile() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [userId] = state.userAPI.userId const [Token] = state.token const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [profile, setProfile] = useState([]) const [user, setUser] = useState([]) const [callback, setCallback] = state.userAPI.callback useEffect(() =>{ const getUser = async () =>{ const res = await axios.get(`/api/customer/${userId}`, { headers: {Authorization: Token} }) setProfile(res.data) } getUser() }) const handleSubmit = async e =>{ e.preventDefault() try { await axios.put(`/user/changePassword/${profile.Id}`, {...user}, { headers: {Authorization: Token} }) setCallback(!callback) window.location.href = "/"; } catch (err) { alert(err.response.data.msg) } } const handleChangeInput = e =>{ const {name, value} = e.target setUser({...user, [name]:value}) } if(loading) return
return ( <> {profile.length !==0 &&

Welcome

} {profile.length === 0 && } ) } export default Profile
